summary: Implemented a new /biodata route with a public Biodata page containing the requested headings and two content sections, and added a visible Biodata link in the desktop header navigation and footer. Mobile-menu behavior (including closing on click) cannot be fully verified from the truncated diff. Some additional footer marketing/contact content was added beyond the request.

missing_requirements.requirement: The header mobile navigation includes a link labeled "Biodata" that navigates to /biodata and closes the mobile menu on click.
missing_requirements.reason: AppHeader.tsx is truncated before the mobile menu section, so the presence of the mobile "Biodata" link and the explicit "close on click" behavior cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded footer content (instructor portrait image, instructor bio paragraph, phone number, email address, and updated copyright/attribution section).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-55 only asked to add a footer link labeled "Biodata" to /biodata. The additional instructor/contact/branding content is not requested in the BuildRequest.
